author: Reuters
description: Canada lost 68,000 jobs in May and the unemployment rate rose to 8.2%, as lockdowns imposed to curb a harsh third wave of COVID-19 continued to weigh on the economy, Statistics Canada data showed on Friday.
title: VIEW Canada loses 68000 jobs in May, unemployment rate rises to 8.2% - Reuters
content: Canada lost 68,000 jobs in May and the unemployment rate rose to 8.2%, as lockdowns imposed to curb a harsh third wave of COVID-19 continued to weigh on the economy, Statistics Canada data showed on … [+2692 chars]

author: David Ljunggren
description: Canada unexpectedly posted a trade surplus of C$594 million ($492.13 million) in April, as a shortage of chips slashed imports and exports of motor vehicles and parts, Statistics Canada data indicated on Tuesday.
title: UPDATE 1-Canada posts trade surplus as chip shortage slashes imports - Reuters.com
content:

author: Reuters Staff
description: Inflation in Canada in May reached its fastest pace in a decade, driven by surging shelter and passenger vehicles prices, as the impact of the statistical comparison to tanking prices last year eased, Statistics Canada said on Wednesday.
title: UPDATE 1-Canada's annual inflation rate in May accelerates to 3.6% - Reuters
content:
By Reuters Staff

description: The temperature in Lytton, British Columbia, soared to 47.9C on Monday, as a heatwave continues.
